statements: SELECT * FROM network_performance_metrics
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM network_performance_metrics WHERE metric_value > 100
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM network_performance_metrics ORDER BY metric_value DESC
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM network_performance_metrics WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00'
SELECT AVG(metric_value) as avg_metric_value FROM network_performance_metrics
SELECT * FROM network_performance_metrics ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT metric_id, metric_name FROM network_performance_metrics WHERE metric_value > 100
SELECT metric_name, timestamp FROM network_performance_metrics WHERE metric_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM network_performance_metrics WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2021-12-31 23:59:59' ORDER BY metric_value DESC
SELECT DISTINCT metric_name FROM network_performance_metrics
SELECT * FROM NetworkPerformanceMetrics;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM NetworkPerformanceMetrics WHERE metric_value > 100;
SELECT metric_id, timestamp FROM NetworkPerformanceMetrics ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM ServiceQualityTrends WHERE trend_id = 1;
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM ServiceQualityTrends WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT metric_id, metric_name, metric_value, timestamp FROM NetworkPerformanceMetrics WHERE metric_value > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM NetworkPerformanceMetrics WHERE metric_name LIKE 'CPU%' AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT trend_id, trend_name, timestamp FROM ServiceQualityTrends WHERE trend_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY trend_id ASC
SELECT * FROM NetworkPerformanceMetrics WHERE metric_value <= 100 AND timestamp > '2022-02-15'

SELECT metric_id, metric_name, metric_value, timestamp FROM NetworkPerformanceMetrics INNER JOIN ServiceQualityTrends ON NetworkPerformanceMetrics.timestamp = ServiceQualityTrends.timestamp ORDER BY trend_id DESC
SELECT * FROM NetworkDevices;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM NetworkDevices WHERE location='Server Room';
SELECT device_name, ip_address FROM NetworkDevices WHERE device_type='Router';
SELECT device_name, device_type, location FROM NetworkDevices ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM NetworkMetrics WHERE metric_type='CPU Usage' ORDER BY metric_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM NetworkDevices;
SELECT device_name, ip_address FROM NetworkDevices WHERE location='Server Room';
SELECT * FROM NetworkMetrics ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_name, metric_name, metric_value FROM NetworkDevices AS d JOIN NetworkMetrics AS m ON d.device_id = m.device_id;
SELECT issue_description, issue_status, reported_by, resolved_timestamp FROM NetworkIssues WHERE issue_status='resolved';
SELECT * FROM network_devices;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type FROM network_devices WHERE device_name LIKE 'Printer%' ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT device_name, location FROM network_devices WHERE active = TRUE AND location <> 'Server Room' LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5;
SELECT device_name, ip_address FROM network_devices WHERE device_type IN ('Switch', 'Router') AND location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics WHERE metric_name = 'CPU Utilization' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM network_devices WHERE active = TRUE;
SELECT device_name, location, ip_address FROM network_devices ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_type, location, ip_address FROM network_devices WHERE device_type = 'Router';
SELECT device_name, location, ip_address FROM network_devices WHERE location LIKE '%Floor%';
SELECT device_name, device_type, ip_address FROM network_devices WHERE active = TRUE AND location <> 'Data Center';
SELECT * FROM network_devices;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM network_devices WHERE device_type = 'Router';
SELECT device_name, device_model, location_id FROM network_devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_model, location_id FROM network_devices WHERE device_type = 'Switch' ORDER BY location_id;
SELECT device_name, device_type, location_id FROM network_devices WHERE location_id IN (SELECT location_id FROM locations WHERE city = 'New York');
SELECT * FROM network_devices;
SELECT device_name, device_model FROM network_devices WHERE device_type='Router';
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT locations.location_name, locations.city, locations.country, network_devices.device_name FROM locations INNER JOIN network_devices ON locations.location_id = network_devices.location_id WHERE locations.city='New York';
SELECT network_devices.device_name, network_issues.timestamp, network_issues.issue_description FROM network_devices INNER JOIN network_issues ON network_devices.device_id = network_issues.device_id;
